events.name: Thursday 25th June
events.description: Our goal is to make the Ruby on Rails community in Singapore more inclusive for women and other minorities - so if you know anyone that codes or that you think would enjoy learning to code, invite them along!

events.name: Mobile Growth Hackers at BASH with HotelQuickly, 99.co, + PicoCandy
events.description: We're excited to announce that our first Mobile Growth Hackers meetup in Singapore is June 25! Come meet other GrowthHackers, network, have some snacks and drinks, and get great insights on how to drive success for your mobile app. Our Meetup will be held at Block 79 JTC LaunchPad @ one-north. Hear from a panel of mobile growth experts as they take a deep dive into the strategies they used to grow their mobile apps. Panelists • Tomas Laboutka, CEO, HotelQuickly • Anuj Bheda, Co-founder, 99.co • Austin Hay, Partner Growth, Branch Metrics • Khang Toh, CTO and Co-founder, PicoCandy The panel will be moderated by Viren Shetty, Mobile Growth Hacker. The panel will run from 7pm to 8pm, with plenty of time for Q&A at the end. Before and after the panel, you'll have time to chat with your fellow GrowthHackers and enjoy pizza and drinks.

events.name: 2nd Bluemix SG Meetup: Building your mobile backend with Bluemix and SoftLayer
events.description: It's another meetup with Bluemix, and this month we're going to introduce how you can build your mobile backend with Bluemix. We've also teamed up with SoftLayer to tell you more about what MobileFirst Platform is, and how you can deploy your MobileFirst Platform on SoftLayer. In the spirit of our Bluemix meetups, we will focus on technical demos. Agenda: 7pm - 7.30pm: Registration + Pizza 7.30pm - 8.30pm: How to build your iOS or Android mobile backend with Bluemix 8.30pm - 9.30pm: Set up and Run your MobileFirst Platform on SoftLayer How to build your iOS or Android mobile backend with Bluemix Learn how to easily set up your mobile backend really quickly, with monitoring and logging capabilities, data synchronisation, push notifications, and much more. Set up and run your MobileFirst Platform on SoftLayer Learn how and why Mobile App developers run their MobileFirst environment + their iOS and Android Apps in production on SoftLayer. Gain Practical insights in a hands-on demo on how you can quickly and easily design and provision the IBM SoftLayer reference architecture for MobileFirst.

events.name: iOS Dev Scout June Meetup
events.description: Venue: Multi-purpose Room, 9th Floor, Suntec Tower Five, 5 Temasek Blvd, #09-01 Suntec Tower Five,[masked] Nearby MRT: Promenade, City Hall, Esplanade Speakers: 1st Talk: Shubham & Sudeep 2nd Talk: Mugunth Kumar Quick Talks: Akira Hirakawa Agenda: 7:00 PM: Shubham and Sudeep will talk about custom animations in iOS 7:45 PM: Mugunth will share what's new in iOS 9 SDK 8:30 PM: Show & Tell / Quick Talks - Akira to share about Swift Coding Style - Some show and tell about new products
events.location: PayPal office in Suntec, 5 Temasek Blvd, #09-01 Suntec Tower Five, 038985 Nearest Mrt:Promenade(Yellow Line), Singapore
